00.heading: Start here
00.description: Welcome. This site is a catalog of ideas about the Christian faith. Click the dot at bottom right to advance, or wander through the catalog ad hoc.

01.heading: The nature of faith
01.description: Faith is where science cannot prove and logic must be inferred. It is the foundation of all extra-naturalistic belief.

02.heading: Methodology
02.description: Methodolgoy, not limited by science, includes metaphysics and relies on inferred logic. See faith. Must reconcile with science.
